game.name: ImpossiBall
game.shortDescription: Casual indie game, Player controls a ball through a variety of levels. Each level offers varying difficulties as the player progresses. The aim is to colllect a range of pickups, each worth varying points. Think pinball arcade game with a twist. Can you do the ImpossiBall and complete all levels?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Casual indie game, Player controls a ball through a variety of levels. Each level offers varying difficulties as the player progresses. The aim is to colllect a range of pickups, each worth varying points. Think pinball arcade game with a twist. Can you do the ImpossiBall and complete all levels?
